multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.

You have won the %1 Jackpot! Due to technical problems we are currently unable to add the jackpot to your bankroll automatically. To receive your prize, please contact customer support.
We have not been able to place your bet. Please check your updated balance.
This game is not currently available.
Please log into your account. If you were previously logged in, your session may have expired.
The server is currently undergoing maintenance. Your game should resume automatically in a couple of minutes.
WINS MULTIPLIED BY BET MULTIPLIER. Only the highest win per bet line is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.
3 Bonus symbols pays 3X total bet and triggers 10 free spins
Wild symbols nudge up or down to make wins during free spins
All Musketeers substitute for each other in All for One pays during free spins
The Wild symbol or any partial appearance substitutes all symbols except the Bonus symbol
Each full wild that is part of a winning combination shows the multiplier reel

The Three Musketeers
About the game The Three Musketeers is a 5 reel 3 row, 20 bet lines video slot. The game features Free Spins with Wild Multiplier, Wild Symbol Nudge and the All for One feature.
Theoretical payout is 96.64%
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow the 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN symbol button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the bet by clicking on the display to select the total bet of your choice. The TOTAL BET is based on the bet per line multiplied with the number of bet lines plus FEATURE BET, bet lines are fixed at 20. The FEATURE BET is always played and enables the wild multiplier reel.
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN symbol button. You can Quick Stop the game by pressing the SPIN symbol button again.
Win Any total win will in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field. All wins are multiplied with the bet per bet line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per bet line is paid. The separate bet line wins will be displayed on the bet lines during win presentation. In Free Spins only the total win is displayed for each spin.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality can is used to get the shortest game round possible.
Autoplay Autoplay allows you to play a number of game rounds automatically. Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the low left of the game you can choose: Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.
Special symbols
Wild Symbols The Wild Symbols or any partial version appearing substitutes for all symbols except the Free Spin Scatter symbol. Each full wild that is part of a winning combination shows the multiplier reel which lands on a value from 1X to 4 X and multiplies all wins by that value.
Bonus Symbol Bonus symbols are not bound to bet lines. Three or more Bonus symbols initiate the Free Spins feature. Three or more Bonus symbols pay bet X3.
Game Features
Free Spins 3 Bonus symbols will initiate 10 Free Spins. The Free Spins feature will play until there are no Free Spins left.
Wild Symbol Nudge Wild symbols nudge up or down to make wins during free spins
All for One Feature During free spins all Musketeers are considered to be the same symbol for win evaluation.
Malfunction in the game voids all pays.
Game round has not been completed
